about_the_game:
Extraordinary magnificence, boundless fantasy

Fantastic scenery, unprecedented spectacles, welcome to this oriental magical world that is both real and illusory! As a destined person, you will embark on a strange journey to the West, and every step will bring new surprises and challenges. Explore the unexplored secrets and write an epic adventure legend again.

The demons reappear, and the demons are dancing wildly

The famous traveler, the cunning and changeable demon king. On the way west, there are not only beautiful scenery, but also many powerful enemies waiting for your challenge. The destined person will have a fierce duel with countless monsters and monsters on this road until the last moment.

The earth shook and the mountains shook, and magical powers appeared

Learned the art of immortality and learned boundless changes. Colorful spells and magical treasures constitute the most classic combat elements in Chinese mythology. The Destined One can not only master a variety of stick skills, but can also freely combine various spells, changes, talents, weapons and armor to find the fighting style that best suits them.

Everything is ever-changing, stirring the soul

Six forms, six weapons, six forms and six emotions. The cunning and viciousness of the enemies is only on the surface, and the stories behind them are often more fascinating. In addition to fierce battles, Destiny will also explore the background stories of various characters, understand their emotions and motivations, and reveal their love and hate, greed and anger, past and present lives.

  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit

short_description: Hellfire: Wukong is an action role-playing game inspired by Chinese mythology. From ancient temples to mysterious valleys, there are unsolved mysteries hidden in every corner. You need to use your wisdom and strength to reveal the truth buried deep in history.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
